TEXT.S: Dudley Bradley nalecuhan i Baltimore, Maryland, nanu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, pahanhanan tu kawaw ayza. Dudley Bradley i 1979 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 1 ku uwac atu silsil 13, namapili' tu nu Indiana Pacers putiput. 3 bulad 19 demiad, 1957 a mihca, Dudley Bradley, miunduay.
